European * Eastern * Halal - Kitchen. Instrumental music. Average fee 700 som Buhara +996 555–19–44–44 Ibraimova, 105 https://goo.gl/maps/sGZ4vaCvuMrNpC7K6
Eastern * European HALAL kitchen. Average fee 300 soms. Faiza +996 555–32–49–22 Mederova, 157 https://goo.gl/maps/c3o4Weyi69nmWsB7A
Eastern * European HALAL kitchen. Average fee 800 soms. Navat +996 551–53–11–11 Togolok Moldo, 114/1 https://goo.gl/maps/sQ8rtF2oac53jeo99
Asian * European * Kyrgyz HALAL kitchen. Dance floor available. Average fee 1200 soms. Supara +996 555–46–50–51 Karagul Akmat, 1 https://goo.gl/maps/aC45thN8wEXGXCkJ9
/* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
Ala-Too Cinema is the oldest and one of the most famous in the city of Bishkek. It is considered a cultural monument of the Kyrgyz Republic, and for the audience it is a place of immersion in the magic of real cinema. It is also the first cinema in the city to offer 3D movies. Ala Too +996 312–66–19–57 Boulevard Erkindik, 53 https://goo.gl/maps/xGs9EejLUknqbPnt8
The cinema of the Cinematica network, which bears the name COSMOPARK, is located in the entertainment center of the same name and opened in 2011. The cinema has five cinemas, four of which are designed for 205 seats, and one for 378 seats. The height of the screen in the largest hall of the network reaches 7 meters. In addition, in 2014, two cinemas were opened here, designed for the rental of Russian films. Cosmo Park +996 312–29–93–93 7 microdistrict, st. K.Marks / Donetsk https://goo.gl/maps/WiZTjxRAKu8MhXnK8
Cinema Oktyabr is the first reconstructed cinema in Kyrgyzstan, where modern sound equipment Dolby Digital Surround is installed. The cinema opened in 2005. There are three cinema halls with 255, 72 and 30 seats. October +996 312–39–20–79 Chuy, 184 https://goo.gl/maps/1t6m8TBCXsnmoXSJ8
Cinema "Russia" is located on Chui Avenue, and there is everything that is necessary for any moviegoer! The repertoire contains only the best novelties of world and domestic cinema. You can watch them in six spacious and cozy cinema halls. All are equipped with modern equipment that allows you to achieve maximum pleasure from the level of quality. Also in the cinema there are various promotions and a discount system. Russia +996 312–66–09–60 Chuy, 213 https://goo.gl/maps/hNf5tV2JfvWT52Yw5
/* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
This is a multifunctional complex with a total area of more than 70,000 square meters, located in the center of Bishkek, at the intersection of the two largest Ibraimov Streets and Chui Avenue. On the territory of the complex there are: shopping galleries, a business center, an amusement park for children, a modern cinema, a multi-level parking lot for 800 cars and much more. Dordoi Plaza +996 312–62–30–00 Ibraimova, 115 https://goo.gl/maps/FUwKW7fy4HXRMB8cA
Bishkek Park is the up-market mall in Bishkek with luxury stores and fine restaurants - not as fancy as other malls in larger cities, but nonetheless, one of the better places to shop in Bishkek. Bishkek Park +996 312–31–20–31 Kievskaya, 148B https://g.page/BishkekPark?share
Asia mall is the largest shopping center in the country, striving to satisfy every customer, combining modern technologies and national roots. Asia Mall +996 551–89–00–40 Mir Ave, 3 https://g.page/asiamall?share
Amazing mall famous for "Sky Park" is the largest entertainment center in Bishkek. Ala Archa +996 500–30–00–60 Chyngyz Aitmatov, 299B https://goo.gl/maps/Pg4kvt23LNAWXoFg6
